bug.question: I have spots and can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have round dots on my back.
🍃 I like to sit on leaves.
✈️ I can go up, up, up in the air!

bug.question: I make honey. Buzz, buzz, buzz!

hints.text: 🍯 I make something sweet to eat!
🐝 I live in a hive with all my friends.

bug.question: I crawl and eat leaves. I turn into a butterfly!

hints.text: 🌿 I love to munch on green things.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am super strong for my size!
🏠 I live underground in a colony.

bug.question: I hop and make a chirping sound. I have long back legs.

hints.text: 🎶 I make a sound like 'chirp, chirp'.

bug.question: I make a web and catch bugs. Be careful!

hints.text: 🐞 Other bugs get stuck in my home.

bug.question: I light up at night. I blink and glow.

hints.text: 💡 I have a light on my bottom.
🌃 You can see me when it's bedtime.

bug.question: I can camouflage and blend into the leaves. I am a master of disguise.

hints.text: 🍃 I look like part of a tree.
🌿 I am usually green or brown.

bug.question: I can jump very far, my back legs are huge. I like eating crops.

hints.text: 🌾 Sometimes I am considered a pest
🐸 Some animals eat me, especially frogs
🚀 I can jump many times my size

bug.question: I have pinchers and a stinger. I live in the desert.

hints.text: ⚠️ Be careful, I can sting you!

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fishies swim in me. What am I?
I am a small fish that is bright orange and white. I live in an anemone. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in a plant underwater
🎬 You may have seen me in a movie!

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a trail behind me
🏠 I carry my house on my back

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?
I am big and gray, and I sing songs under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I breathe air through a blowhole
🎶 I make sounds to talk to my friends

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦞 Some people like to eat me

ocean.question: I am flat and swim in the sea. Some people say I look like a kite. What am I?
I have a pointy nose and like to jump out of the water and play. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live in groups called pods
😄 I like to click and whistle

ocean.question: I have a long body and I swim fast. Some people are scared of me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🔪 I am sometimes called a hunter

ocean.question: I'm a colorful house under the sea, made of tiny creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Fish like to live in me
